summary:
it's time for some !established relationship elu hc 💖💖💖
because of lucas' living situation, he is spending more and more nights...
body:
it’s time for some !established relationship elu hc 💖💖💖

  • because of lucas’ living situation, he is spending more and more nights at eliott’s place (that’s the only place he feels actually accepted and loved) it gets to the point where eliott finds random pieces of lucas’ clothes in his closet/ when eliott shops he always remembers to buy lucas’ favourite foods or stuff lucas texted him to buy
  • they make a rule to have one day a week dedicated to themselves (usually it’s lazy sunday and they binge watch their current tv show, go to the park where lucas is reading and eliott is drawing him read) after some time the boys squad realizes that there is no use in trying to text them about something on sunday because they will not answer it
  • when they are going to parties they have a rule that one person stays sober (90% of the time it’s eliott bc alcohol just isnt his thing but sometimes he has this urge to get shitfaced drunk) eliott becomes then one of those people who show their s/o pictures and annoy everybody with “look at him isnt he the most beautiful person you’ve ever seen???? that’s my love lulu u know? oh look that’s him in the morning still the prettiest person ever” and lucas is so embarrassed but on the inside he loves his boyfriend so much that he doesn’t have a heart to tell him to stop
  • even after years of dating lucas still gets insecure about his looks/him not being the right person for eliott, eliott will try to tell him what an amazing, caring person he is but lucas still sometimes doesn’t believe it so eliott puts little stick notes on their furniture with compliments/ things he loves about lucas (shit like 1. i love your hair when you wake up 2. your love makes me feel like I’m on cloud nine all the time) lucas stores these notes in his “eliott drawer” and reads them when he feels down or insecure again
  • when they are finally moved in together they get a dog (i want them to have collie i don’t make the rules) and it’s great for both of them: lucas has a company when eliott is working late, eliott finds a reason to get out of bed on his down days, finds a new model for his drawings when lucas isnt around
  • i want them to get a small, cozy apartment with a very limited space but their own (eliott surprises lucas with keyboard he bought for him bc he loves when he’s playing) lucas makes sure to bring all of eliotts vinyls so that they can listen all the dubstep in the world) imagine lucas walking home and seeing new record store and buying something bc eliott might like it 💞
  • every month they have a dinner with lucas’ mom (she gets one day out of clinic and half of the day she spends with lucas and the other half and elu’s apartment eating new recipe eliott found in the book she gave him last christmas they spend together)
  • i see eliott becoming artist in the future (having his own little art gallery) and lucas being scientist/ biologist (he publishes a lot of articles/ has it’s own lab) and their house represents both of them really well (lucas’ articles/studies placed in their library, eliotts art everywhere, open books and paint brushes laying everywhere)
  • i like to see them being really successful in their own fiels and them being at fancy parties like imagine, there’s this big gallery opening and everyone is wondering who’s eliott demaury’s secret partner like everyone is expecting someone as equally artistic as him but surprise surprise it’s the biologist lucas who has no idea about art, is known for his articles about mitochondria like everyone is shook when they see them together
  • they love seeing new places together, exploring the world but it’s difficult bc travelling really stresses lucas out, bring out his anxiety (flying is the worst for him) and eliott isnt better but he tries to be there for lucas, but it’s all worth it when they see beautiful places, see each other’s smiles when they are tasting something for the first time, enjoying life and themselves

summary: God, the chemistry between Lucas and Eliott tho... I'm already in love with them! And I'm not home next weekend to see their...
question: God, the chemistry between Lucas and Eliott tho... I'm already in love with them! And I'm not home next weekend to see their first kiss (if it happens, and I'm sure it happens!) and have to wait even mooooore.
answer:
It is indeed pretty awesome, anon. I’m loving what I’ve seen So fsr

But, ahhh, that sucks, anon! (Unless you’re doing something fun, that is.) I hope you get to see it asap.

I’m not sure if I’m working that day yet, and I’m scaaaared, lmao. Fingers-crossed I’m off!

blog.name: isaknewtons
blog.title: 4am by girl in red
blog.description:
abbey / 19 / canaduh

there’s a lot going on here

tags: ik no one acc cares about my Thoughts but i think im gonna do this for every ep bc i like discussing things w myself
i tried to keep this short tho lol
summary: me being incoherent abt skam france ep 3 below the cut :)![[MORE]] woke: -yann making lucas smile and his double peace signs....
body:
me being incoherent abt skam france ep 3 below the cut :)!

woke:
-yann making lucas smile and his double peace signs. what a man
-I like daphne!! she cares so much about everyone she threw that party even tho it was stressing her out
-I love alexia and how they’re discussing/showing her sexuality. I really appreciate the thought they’ve given to round it out so well, as if it’s not just a throwaway thing if that makes sense?
-omg the prolonged staring like hello
-eliott’s romantic ass walking lucas home.. he has such soft calm quiet earnest vibes :’)
- “not necessarily a girl” eliott i LOVE u
-god heard me bc this episode had NO BAD PANNING SHOTS can u believe

broke:
-maybe it’s just me but lucas lying to himself on the kinsey scale didn’t seem super realistic? just based off last week. idk 
-whew lucas is digging a hole for himself w chloe.. and it seems like there’s more focus on chloe while we’re not getting a lot of lucille? I wonder if they’re shifting the weight of the characters? bc sonja was obviously a big part of og, and while emma was important we didn’t rlly see her after ep 4 (or even that much before, and isak def never proclaimed his love to her in the schoolyard lmfao)
-basile stay the FUCK away from daphne I’m literally going to crush your skull with my bare hands like an apple
-as much as I loved seeing more of the girl squad at the party it felt a little weird to spend that much time outside Lucas’s POV? idk. it’s just w such limited clip time already, it seems a lot was wasted on.. not important/relevant stuff
-I feel like the “gays are funny!” part was rushed (and they didn’t really focus on lucas’s reaction?) 
-not really feeling the soundtrack but that may be out of their hands w regards to copyright stuff

other:
-the fan - actor/director interactions are making me cringe so much + lowkey spoiling everything?? pls. dont
-also can we stop “cancelling” characters bc they.. have flaws….. mess up……….. are realistic human beans…… (not that I don’t dislike basile/mika, or that what lucas said wasn’t gross, but u know what I mean)
-anyone who shades the og in a comparison post owes me $60
body_abstract: me being incoherent abt skam france ep 3 below the cut :)!

blog.name: skamtrash
blog.title: is being alone such a bad thing?
blog.description:
asher. she/her. 26. london, uk.
follows from @key-mochii ✌🏽💖
this is basically a druck and nl blog now

summary: Ok my theory (more like hc): there is no valentine days party with gf but they have to paint (or something else) the common room...
question: Ok my theory (more like hc): there is no valentine days party with gf but they have to paint (or something else) the common room so they stay at school until 7-8pm (so it’s dark outside) and suddenly there is a power cut so it’s all DARK and they kiss (cries in French). In ccl they don’t have to dump their gf on valentine days and everyone is happy
answer:
Hey anon!

I mean, they have to dump their gf’s eventually, but, I get what you mean anon.

Hmmm, I can’t decide I the common room thing will happen now, or later. Like, I can’t see their first kiss happening in that scenario.

Oooh, maybe the common room paint scene is the kitchen scene, instead? Like, Lucas & Eliott get left to plant it alone, end they’re lsientkng to music, and they end up messing around, and playing with the paint, and being all cute and soft hsusjelsnsms!!

blog.name: niffineliot
blog.title: alohomora!
blog.description:
☼ abbie ☼ 21 ☼ irish ☼ she/they ☼ bi ☼ aries ☼ ravenclaw ☼ intp ☼ multifandom/interest ☼
♥ sidebar credit: centorame ♥

summary: 💌💌 elu together. I love your writing so much!!!!
question: 💌💌 elu together. I love your writing so much!!!!
answer:
((thank-you so much, lovely!! i appreciate it a lot ♥))

#1

After they’ve been dating for a few years and both are completely done with school, they finally fulfil a long-time wish of theirs; to get a puppy together. They find this little French bulldog puppy at the local shelter and fall in love the minute it toddles up to Eliott and starts pawing at his feet. As if already demanding to be picked up.

They had only been going to the shelter that day for a look, and hadn’t expected to come home with anything that day. So she came home wrapped up in Lucas’s scarf, alternating between sleeping soundly and peeking out the whole way there. 

Her full name is Achilles, but they call her ‘Kili’ day-to-day (because a weird phase of interest in Greek mythology as a pre-teen is an aspect of gay culture both Lucas and Eliott happened to share).

#2

When it comes to being dog dads, Lucas is the main disciplinarian in their house whereas Eliott’s a bit of a soft-touch and would let her get away with murder. Although it can’t be understated how much they both spoil her. Which is evidenced in how she never seems to want to be off either one of their laps.

One time when they had just got her and she was still too young to get her vaccinations to be able to walk outside, Lucas and Eliott were going a little stir-crazy and needed to get out of the flat but were too nervous to leave her on her own. 

So that evening Eliott ordered one of those baby carrying slings off Amazon and it came the next morning. She was such a calm pup he simply set Kili in it, strapped it to his chest, and the three of them all took a family day out to one of their fave little coffee shops just round the corner from their flat, with Kili in tow.

To this day she remains the ultimate daddys’ girl.

((thank-you so much, lovely!! i appreciate it a lot ♥))

blog.name: arthusa
blog.title: i need you; i love you

summary: When they kiss for the first time, Lucas realizes how much he’s been needing this for a long time. He clings to Eliott, fists...
body:
When they kiss for the first time, Lucas realizes how much he’s been needing this for a long time. He clings to Eliott, fists clenching the taller boy’s clothes as if he needed him to breathe.

Eliott was softly cupping Lucas’ face, while still kissing him carefully. 

The kiss was rushed, for Lucas it felt more as if time had stopped and it went on for hours. Even when Eliott pulled out Lucas still wanted more so he chased after him like he was the only things Lucas had left. Eliott just pushed his head downwards a little and kissed his forehead.

In a rapid movement, Lucas grabbed Eliott by the arms and hugged him tightly without letting go and laying his head on Eliott’s neck breathing in. Eliott kept a pressing hand on his back and another one on his waist.

Lucas kept repeating the same mantra in his head ,you’re not alone, you’re not alone, you’re not alone…

summary: mika & basille’s extreme personalities must have some significance cause they are polarizing everybody. best i can guess (since...
body:
mika & basille’s extreme personalities must have some significance cause they are polarizing everybody.

best i can guess (since it’s all from lucas’ pov) - mika represents lucas’ uneducated negative stereotypes for “gays” - mika is catty and excessively flamboyant - and basille is a horned-up straight teenage boy’s mind on steroids.  all he thinks about is sex, how to get sex, turning women into sex objects, and a dubious understanding of consent.

they serve as caricatures more than characters.

lucas views sexuality as two sides of coin.  he views sexuality as defining a person.  he views sexuality as all encompassing to a person because, while he’s struggling with his identity and sexuality, his sexuality IS all that consumes his mind and energy and actions because he is valuing himself based on his sexuality rather than being a good person or a good friend.

lucas cannot connect to either side of these extremes and feels lost and like he doesn’t belong anywhere.  he copes by going into straight douche mode, playing with a girl’s feelings to protect his sexuality and amping misogyny to eleven.

that’s when our lord and saviour alexia comes in with new positive viewpoints on sexuality - that sexuality is fluid, that it’s okay to be questioning and experimenting and ever-changing.  that he doesn’t have to fit in one or any category.

a big part of this episode was opening up his world to new perspectives.  from alexia, a bicon, to elliott and his implied pansexuality, he’s forming positive associations with sexuality instead of being ashamed of his sexuality.

alexia is a blindingly beautiful example of how her sexuality does not define her.

she is thriving! she is the confident girl in the front row in dance class, she’s the hero of the infiltration party, she’s flirting with girls, blasting idiots the uninformed.

instead of forcing himself into extremely negative “gay” or “straight” stereotypes, he is discovering a place in between that you don’t have to be pinned down in a category.  that love and attraction does not have to be anchored down to either side of the spectrum.  that you can love independently of gender…and good lord do i wish i had this show 10 years ago and struggling.
